mapper.update:
UPDATE `wms_new_material` SET
`new_material_code` = #{set.newMaterialCode},
`new_material_name` = #{set.newMaterialName},
`new_material_group` = #{set.newMaterialGroup},
`new_material_unit` = #{set.newMaterialUnit},
`new_material_specs` = #{set.newMaterialSpecs},
`warehouse_symbol` = #{set.warehouseSymbol},
`applier_user_id` = #{set.applierUserId},
`applier_user_name` = #{set.applierUserName},
`apply_time` = #{set.applyTime},
`checker_name` = #{set.checkerName},
`checked_time` = #{set.checkedTime},
`state` = #{set.state},
`new_material_id` in
#{item} and
`new_material_id` >= #{where.newMaterialIdSt} and
`new_material_id` <= #{where.newMaterialIdEd} and
`new_material_code` in
#{item} and
(
`New_material_code` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`New_material_code` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`new_material_name` in
#{item} and
(
`New_material_name` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`New_material_name` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`new_material_group` in
#{item} and
(
`New_material_group` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`New_material_group` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`new_material_unit` in
#{item} and
(
`New_material_unit` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`New_material_unit` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`new_material_specs` in
#{item} and
(
`New_material_specs` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`New_material_specs` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`warehouse_symbol` in
#{item} and
(
`Warehouse_symbol` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Warehouse_symbol` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`applier_user_id` in
#{item} and
`applier_user_id` >= #{where.applierUserIdSt} and
`applier_user_id` <= #{where.applierUserIdEd} and
`applier_user_name` in
#{item} and
(
`Applier_user_name` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Applier_user_name` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`apply_time` in
#{item} and
(
`Apply_time` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Apply_time` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`checker_name` in
#{item} and
(
`Checker_name` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Checker_name` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`checked_time` in
#{item} and
(
`Checked_time` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Checked_time` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`state` in
#{item} and
(
`State` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`State` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
